title: Conduct and Document an Emergency Drill
description: An EHS specialist is conducting a planned fire drill for the site.

tasks.description: Initiate the fire alarm system to start the drill.
Time how long it takes for all personnel to evacuate to their designated muster points.
tasks.expected_outcome: The EHS specialist records the total evacuation time.

tasks.description: Log the drill details, including the evacuation time and any observations, in the emergency drill log.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new record in the drill log, documenting the successful drill.
